Hanzi: 渎

凟字的基本解释

凟
dú
同“渎”。

凟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dú］
［《廣韻》徒谷切，入屋，定。］
亦作“凟1”。“竇2”的被通假字。亦作“豄1”。“渎1”的繁体字。
(1)沟渠。
(2)江河大川。
(3)指渎谷水。
(4)见“瀆山”。
(5)滥；过度；烦琐。
(6)败乱；混杂。
(7)通“嬻”。亵渎，轻慢。
(8)通“黷”。贪求；玷污。
(9)姓。汉有渎弘之。
[②]［dòu］
［《集韻》大透切，去候，定。］
通“竇1”。“渎2”的繁体字。
洞穴。

凟字的康熙字典解释
凟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
凟字的起名意思

暂无。

Yong
Basic explanation of words
Yong
du
Same as "blasphemy".
Yong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dú］
["Guangyun" Tuguqie, enter the house, set. ]
Also known as "凟1". "Dou 2" was passed falsely. Also known as "豄1". Traditional characters for "Du 1".
(1) Ditch.
(2) Rivers and rivers.
(3) Refers to Dugu water.
(4) See "Dushan".
(5) Overuse; excessive; cumbersome.
(6) Chaos; mixed.
(7) Through "嬻". Blasphemy, contemptuous.
(8) Through "black". Greed; defiled.
(9) Last name. The Han has du Hongzhi.
[②]［dòu］
["Jiyun" is thoroughly cut, waiting, and set. ]
Link "Dus 1". "Du 2" in traditional characters.
cave.
